column1: Tonight my friend @JoeBiden took the stage in Iowa and showed the American people yet again that he is the leader we need to beat Donald Trump and get our nation back on the right path in 2020. #TeamJoe

Under President Trump our national security has been weakened and our relationships with foreign powers have been torn to shreds. We need a president in 2020 with the experience and expertise to restore our standing in the world — starting on day one.  https://t.co/tUKLCWdk7K
I meant what I said and I said what I meant. @JoeBiden’s our guy — 100 percent! https://t.co/iWZj58LrYs
TJ all of us on #TeamJoe are in your corner.   Sending you support and strength from the First State 💪🏻 https://t.co/5oGbq1XZKM
232 years ago today our small but strong state started a nation. And we’ve been leading the way ever since!    Happy #DelawareDay to all!

Proud that my friend Joe has earned the support of a man who knows what real leadership on the global stage looks like -- former Secretary of State John Kerry. He knows that @JoeBiden has what it takes to restore our standing in the world.   Welcome to #TeamJoe @JohnKerry! https://t.co/z85c64d3E2

Looking forward to seeing my friend @JoeBiden take the stage tonight and once again show the American people why he is the most qualified person to lead our country.  RT to wish the next President good luck (and a happy birthday!) https://t.co/6vYx0dsvci
Join me in wishing @JoeBiden a very happy birthday!  We’ve seen a lot of years and a lot of campaigns together Joe but I have a feeling that 2020 will be the best one yet. https://t.co/6vYx0dsvci
Chris is fighting every day for what matters most to Delawareans like lowering health care costs and leaving a safer healthier planet for our kids
My friend @ChrisCoonsforDE knows that real progress comes when we focus on fighting for what's right and getting results for our state.

I’m deeply grateful to have had her support and her counsel over these past decades and I know that her loss will be felt in our community for many years to come. Martha and I are sending our prayers to Gil and to the rest of Sonia’s family today.
This morning I said goodbye to a dear friend. Sonia Schorr Sloan was an activist organizer and a scientist. She was a loving mother grandmother wife neighbor and mentor. https://t.co/iKy7QKiEAS

It's not in question anymore. @realDonaldTrump is brazenly taking advantage of his office for personal profit. His decision to host the G7 at his financially struggling Doral Miami resort is corrupt unscrupulous and frankly embarrassing.  https://t.co/6GnoRvtO0V
Today Martha and I are sending our love and prayers to the family of Chairman Elijah Cummings and to the city of Baltimore. Our nation has lost a good man and a great leader. https://t.co/gE58h76jTp
We need a leader who will restore our reputation. We need a president who knows what leadership means. We need @JoeBiden. https://t.co/VdTKvfbmqE
@realDonaldTrump by abandoning our Kurdish allies has shown the world -- our friends and enemies alike -- that America's word cannot be trusted.
You can’t fake experience. @JoeBiden has it and it’s clear that he would be ready to lead and restore our standing in the world on day one. #DemDebate
Tonight I’m thrilled to cheer on my friend @JoeBiden as he lays out his vision to restore ethics in government and improve the lives of everyday Americans.  https://t.co/GGxq7pEOD5

This weekend Martha and I had a fantastic time in Iowa telling folks all across the state why we’re proud to be part of #TeamJoe. Thanks to the @JoeforIA team and everyone we met in the Hawkeye State for your hospitality! https://t.co/5wXXiqIB7J
In 2016 candidate Trump benefited from foreign interference into our elections. We can't afford to see him use the same playbook in 2020. We need the whole truth.   https://t.co/6zIf3rSRx8
No surprise here. The American people recognize and appreciate my friend @JoeBiden's hard work integrity and authenticity 👍 https://t.co/mPn9zgIuJK
Tonight I will be cheering Joe on from Delaware. We’re so proud of the work he’s doing on behalf of every American and thrilled to be part of @TeamJoe.

Joe also has a plan to protect older Americans as they prepare for retirement by preserving and strengthening Social Security and working to lower the costs of prescription drugs https://t.co/fcjyuV7ZzM

I hope he also gets the chance to tell voters tonight about his comprehensive plan to reform and improve our criminal justice system and ensure that liberty and justice for all is at its core   https://t.co/euGlxSVlJn

Today Joe published an op-Ed talking how his personal experiences with the American health care system after his family’s tragic car accident helped him create his new health care plan which will protect and build on the successes of Obamacare  https://t.co/IKI5ojuXn2

Tonight my friend VP @JoeBiden will take the debate stage again to talk about his vision for America. I know he’s been hard at work introducing voters to his bold policy goals for his first term as President. I can’t wait to see him talk about his big plans for America's future

My colleagues in the House and Senate ran for office out of a deep dedication to our country and a desire to form a “more perfect” union — just as our Founders intended. I’m proud to stand with them and against hateful and purposely divisive rhetoric.   https://t.co/yDl5gXzBSX
His bold new plan will ensure that health care is a right not a privilege while reducing costs and making our health care system easier to navigate. #TeamJoe
.@JoeBiden knows that every American deserves the peace of mind that comes with quality affordable health care. Learn more here: https://t.co/JkuQiFb6Gl

ICYMI: Lt. Col. @AmyMcGrathKY— Marine Corps vet 20-year fighter pilot and mom of three— has announced a bid for Mitch McConnell’s U.S. Senate seat. Looking forward to a return to bipartisanship and regular order in Congress. https://t.co/SDERemViIP
What a 4th! Yesterday I traveled up and down the state for parades in every county. It was wonderful to see so many Delawareans out to celebrate the red white and blue! https://t.co/kalfdS6Jy9

Just settling in to watch Vice President Biden address the nation on the second night of the Democratic Presidential Debates. Very proud to be part of @TeamJoe. Good luck from Delaware my friend! #TeamJoe

This week I joined my colleagues across the aisle in supporting the Preventing Unconstitutional War with Iran Act. We must make sure that our President doesn't stumble into a reckless military conflict with Iran.    https://t.co/AsRT355jZG

A candidate hand-picked by Donald Trump has just announced that he's running to unseat my friend Sen. @GaryPeters. We need Gary in the Senate if we're ever going to undo the damage that PresidentTrump has done to our democracy. Join his fight here --> https://t.co/B8RT5W6RhX
What a beautiful day in Ocean View for a picnic with @DelDems38! The 38th RD is home to some great Democrats and great barbecue-- here's looking at you @BethanyBluesBBQ. https://t.co/maM0Lmd16V
The fact is our nation can’t afford to play political games with the Census.

This isn’t surprising but it is deeply disturbing. New evidence has emerged to confirm that the motivation behind the GOP's push to add a citizenship question to the Census is to give "Republicans and non-Hispanic whites" an electoral advantage. https://t.co/tTDCXCK2Vt
In his report and again in his press conference yesterday the Special Counsel made clear that it is now up to Congress to do its job and get to the truth.  https://t.co/07fIxlq499
We can’t become desensitized to these dangerous anti-truth and anti-science attacks if we’re going to preserve this planet for future generations.

It’s worth reminding ourselves every so often: This isn’t normal. It’s not normal for a presidential appointee to claim that the “demonization of carbon dioxide is just like the demonization of the poor Jews under Hitler.”  https://t.co/Z5AjjoToFu
To summarize: Congress was actually designed to investigate and legislate all at the same time. It’s time for President Trump to let us do our job.
(This is the system of “checks and balances” that the Founders created with the explicit intent to limit the powers of each branch of our government.)

Another one of those duties is oversight. As a co-equal branch of government we commit to oversight of the Presidential Administration in order to ensure that the duties of the executive branch are being carried out faithfully and lawfully.
(That in particular was the intended focus of our infrastructure meeting at the White House yesterday.)

One of these duties is of course legislating. When my colleagues and I are sworn in we commit to writing the legislation that keeps our nation running smoothly. We commit to fixing our roads highways & bridges when they become obsolete.
Now as a reminder— members of Congress have duties that we are bound by the American people to perform. These duties are laid out in the Constitution.
President Trump had a temper tantrum and left the room— and then held a surprise press conference to say that he’s refusing to allow us to legislate while investigations into his conduct continue.

Wednesday afternoon I went to the White House looking forward to continuing a productive bipartisan dialogue on addressing our nation’s infrastructure needs. Unfortunately that's.. not exactly what ended up happening.   https://t.co/CRP4sxFinL

Martha and I had a great time today at the Biden for President rally in beautiful Philadelphia our nation’s birthplace. It was wonderful to see our friends @JoeBiden and @DrBiden and to meet some of their incredible staff! We’re so proud to be part of #TeamJoe. https://t.co/YAtjJhzHoj

.@realDonaldTrump might think that trade wars are good policy but American manufacturers businesses farmers and families who pay the price disagree. Congress cannot continue to turn a blind eye.   https://t.co/DHbiFRlGBd

I’m really excited to be joining my friend @JoeBiden next Saturday as he kicks off his campaign for president with a rally in Philly. If you have a couple of free hours come join us! Sign up here >> https://t.co/PagKkKf89b
The American people deserve the whole truth.

It's been said that if the American people know the truth they won't make a mistake. But in an unprecedented move President Trump has invoked executive privilege to keep the full report from seeing the light of day. What is he hiding?   https://t.co/ex2qXkH8sL
President Trump remains committed to eliminating every environmental protection that President Obama put in place— at the cost of our health public safety and our planet.   https://t.co/yWSqJXydJL
Thank you Maria Matos for your decades of fierce leadership and to the 100+ staff members in New Castle County that make it all possible! https://t.co/C6nNpZxiy7

Congratulations to the @LACCDE on fifty years of... ✅ Early childhood education programs ✅ Crisis support programs ✅ Short- and long-term case management ✅ Advocacy for crime victims  ✅ ESL classes  And so much more.

Thank you to ⁦@YourDNREC⁩ ⁦@delawaretech⁩ and ⁦@Dartfirststate⁩ for your leadership in protecting Delaware’s natural resources!   https://t.co/q2KaSgdJ3X’s-earth-day-visit-cape-henlopen-state-park/179130
Those are the qualities that make @JoeBiden an exceptional human being and those are the qualities that will enable him to serve with distinction as our next president.
Even more importantly though he is a devoted husband a loving father and grandfather and a dedicated son and brother.
.@JoeBiden has been a terrific vice president an exceptional representative for the people of Delaware a thoughtful colleague and an even better friend.

Even through unimaginable tragedy and triumph Joe has always had the heart of a servant and an unwavering belief that our country's best days are still ahead. I cannot think of anyone better suited to lead our nation at this critical time than @JoeBiden.

.@JoeBiden is also uniquely positioned to help restore America’s standing in the world. He understands the world. He’s traveled the world. He knows world leaders personally and they know and respect him. From the moment he takes office Joe will be ready to lead.

Alongside @BarackObama Joe helped lead our nation out of the greatest economic downturn since the Great Depression helped expand access to quality affordable health care for millions ensure equality for our LGTBQ friends and family support our veterans and protect our planet
.@JoeBiden has spent his career championing policies that help all Americans. He is a tested experienced leader with a proven track record of getting things done for our country.

.@JoeBiden has proven that you can disagree without being disagreeable and that you can compromise on policy without compromising your principles. He is a man of his word and of integrity and it is that character that has earned him the respect of voters and world leaders alike

In 1982 it was then-Senator Joe Biden who first encouraged me to run for the U.S. House of Representatives. Today I could not be more proud to endorse my friend @JoeBiden as he launches his campaign to be the next President of the United States. #Joe2020 https://t.co/gIGQhIg9YI

Every American deserves clean air to breathe and clean water to drink no matter their race income level or zip code. That's why @TammyForIL @CoryBooker and I launched the new Senate Environmental Justice Caucus-- more here: https://t.co/vsyYCjmCJz
Another great Sussex County Democratic Committee Spring Dinner is in the books! Thanks to our hardworking Sussex @deldems for having me! https://t.co/Bbdg1Klcqm

We can't have life liberty or the pursuit of happiness without clean safe drinking water. My bipartisan bill the PFAS Action Act would help communities suffering with PFAS contamination in their groundwater:   https://t.co/0z2daeieyY

What a beautiful morning to take a few hours and help clean up the Christina River Watershed! Thanks to my fellow volunteers from the 7th Street Park site and to Marian Young from @BrightFieldsInc for leading us to success. https://t.co/c7BizC6N3g

President Trump should show us his tax returns-- plain and simple. But since he has refused to I joined a bipartisan group of my colleagues to ask that the IRS release the President's tax returns for him.   https://t.co/GDhRiKvW7X

Let’s make one thing clear: When President Trump attaches the ACA he attacks the millions of Americans who rely on it for access to affordable quality health care. This has to stop.   https://t.co/KZOLn1DrrV

Today we observe #VietnamWarVeteransDay. I'll never stop working to ensure all our veterans who have answered the call of duty have the care they have earned. Today and every day -- thank you for your service. https://t.co/8feulO1s3b

This landmark legislation is a crucial first step to ensure that the government "of the people by the people and for the people" keeps power with the American people. I'm proud to join every one of my Democratic colleagues to introduce it this week.   https://t.co/CqCqLQ7nRJ

President Trump's latest attempt to scrap the entire ACA will strip coverage from millions of Americans including the more than 400000 Delawareans living with pre-existing conditions. One word: Unacceptable.  https://t.co/hr5qBxoBix
As the song goes “Life is a highway!” So glad to still be riding it in my 2001 Chrysler Town and Country minivan— half a million miles down and still so far to go!  https://t.co/8uLJmPsFGl
It’s time to end taxation without representation. That’s why I introduced the Washington D.C. Admission Act.   https://t.co/bgCPgIdMBy

I think that real leaders walk the walk and talk the talk— that’s why I traveled to three countries in Central America last weekend to see firsthand the crises forcing their citizens to risk so much to get to the U.S. https://t.co/sUP4KJkjva

The American people deserve an Attorney General who’s squarely on their side. Sadly Pres. Trump nominated someone whose record suggests that he’ll only be on the President’s side. That’s why I voted against the confirmation of his nominee William Barr.

A.G. Barr’s new job will require him to be an impartial manager of the Russia investigation.  His past commentary on the Special Counsel Robert Mueller and Mueller’s investigation suggests that he may not be capable of doing that.
That’s good for President Trump... but not so good for the American people.

The role of the Attorney General is to be the People’s Lawyer — not the President’s lawyer. President Trump’s next A.G. William Barr has made it clear that he believes in sweeping presidential power. https://t.co/jufDKoVmbR

Again and again Acting Administrator Wheeler has rejected common-sense measures that would keep our air cleaner and our water safer— measures supported by environmental groups and industry stakeholders alike. This has to stop.    https://t.co/kYOO1oDcFB

After 35 days President Trump has given up his senseless shutdown and agreed to what my colleagues and I have requested from Day 1:   ☑️ Re-open the government ☑️ Get federal workers their paychecks ☑️ Start a conversation about smart border security
